page.title: 21The Rox festival
page.content:
Every year there is the Rox festival held in the grounds of the royal hotel and the surrounding area, a free of charge music festival lasting from Saturday to Sunday night where local bands from all over the region can perform to an audience, there are also occasions where famous bands may play, for example in 2010 "The Jam" performed as the closing act on Sunday

This years Rox festival will be held late summer 2011
